data.title: Amazon Is Slashing Prices Up to 50% on Name-Brand Espresso Machines for Prime Day
data.meta_description: Deals & Offers: Start your morning the right way
data.text:
EDITED BY MICHELLE PRADO, COMMERCE CONTENT DIRECTOR Promotions listed were available when the article was published. Find more Amazon Prime Day Deals here.

It’s no secret that a perfectly brewed cup of espresso is the ultimate way to start your day. And, thanks to Amazon’s annual Prime Day sale, you can score some significant discounts on top-of-the-line espresso machines. Skip the lines at the coffee shop and bring barista-level espresso right to your kitchen with these 10 espresso machine deals for Prime Day.

Breville Barista Touch Espresso Machine

On sale for $200 off the original price, this Breville Barista Touch espresso machine churns out seriously strong coffee with the touch of a button. It’s equipped with a built-in espresso grinder and a steamer for cappuccinos, lattes and other milk-based drinks. Simply choose your drink of choice from the touchscreen and let the machine do the work for you.

Original Price: $999.95

Sale Price: $799.95 (20% off)

Buy now on Amazon

Breville Barista Express Espresso Machine

Another quality Breville offering, the Barista Express Espresso Machine features a series of manual knobs and dials that allow you to craft your perfect cup with the ultimate precision. It includes a grinder, a tamper and a milk frother, and it’s also on sale for a hefty $200 off.

Original Price: $749.95

Sale Price: $549.95 (27% off)

Buy now on Amazon

Smeg Espresso Coffee Machine

With its chic retro design that’s available in multiple colors (including a vibrant red), this Smeg Espresso Coffee Machine makes delicious drinks while also making a statement on your countertop. Its simple yet functional design includes a user-friendly, three-button control panel plus a steamer for milk-based beverages.

Original Price: $449.95

Sale Price: $295 (34% off)

Buy now on Amazon

Bialetti Moka Express Stovetop Espresso Maker

Want to make your coffee the authentic Italian way? You can grab this Bialetti Moka Express stovetop espresso maker for 33% off right now. Simply fill the boiler (i.e. the bottom section) with water, add your ground coffee into the filter, screw the top on and place the whole thing on your stove over medium heat. Once you hear the coffee gurgling, it’s time to enjoy!

Original Price: $39.99

Sale Price: $26.82 (33% off)

Buy now on Amazon

Calphalon Temp iQ Espresso Machine

This Calphalon Temp iQ Espresso Machine offers plenty of bells and whistles for a great value — especially since it’s on sale for nearly half off right now. The stainless steel machine features a dial interface, a two-liter water reservoir, a steam wand and a cup warming tray to ensure your coffee comes out piping hot.

Original Price: $499.99

Sale Price: $259.99 (48% off)

Buy now on Amazon

Calphalon Compact Espresso Machine

Looking for something that will take up a little less space on your counter? Opt for the Calphalon Compact Espresso Machine, which boasts a slender design and a simple, no-frills control panel. Like the aforementioned Temp iQ, this one also includes a steam wand and a cup-warming area on top of the machine.

Original Price: $329.99

Sale Price: $199.99 (39% off)

Buy now on Amazon

Nespresso Vertuo POP+ Deluxe Coffee and Espresso Machine

Another excellent space-saving option, the Nespresso Vertuo POP+ is designed for single-use coffee capsules — and you’ll get a complimentary tasting pack with the machine. This sleek and simple device has a convenient, one-touch operating system with a 30-second heat-up time, automatic pod ejection and an adjustable drip tray that fits a range of cup sizes.

Original Price: $199.95

Sale Price: $129 (35% off)

Buy now on Amazon

De’Longhi Magnifica Evo Coffee and Espresso Maker

One of the best deals on our list, this De’Longhi Magnifica Evo Coffee and Espresso Maker is on sale for over half off the original price. It boasts a one-touch control panel, an adjustable milk frother and a built-in burr grinder with 13 different settings.

Original Price: $1,039.95

Sale Price: $499.95 (52% off)

Buy now on Amazon

Ninja Espresso and Coffee Barista System

Compatible with both coffee grounds and capsules, this Ninja Espresso and Coffee Barista System is one of the most versatile machines on our list. It’s got the works: a built-in frother, an adjustable cup tray, a warming plate, a used capsule storage bin and a 12-cup carafe. It also lets you choose from three espresso brew styles and nine different cup sizes.

Original Price: $249.99

Sale Price: $189.99 (24% off)

Buy now on Amazon

Cuisinart EM-15 Defined Espresso Machine

A great bargain buy, the Cuisinart EM-15 Defined Espresso Machine is compatible with Nespresso Original Line coffee capsules. You can choose from either single or double espresso shots and adjust the brew temperature and flavor strength to create your perfect cup.

Original Price: $199.95

Sale Price: $119.96 (40% off)
